mapelements

类 RiskMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapelements.RiskMap

  • public class RiskMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This is class RiskMap to represent a map in Risk Game.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RiskMap()
      The constructor of class RiskMap without initial name, is used to load a map from file.
      RiskMap(java.lang.String name)
      The constructor of class RiskMap with an initial name, is used to create map from scratch.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addCompletedConnection()
      Method to add completed connections.
      ErrorMsg addConnection(java.lang.String countryNameFrom, java.lang.String countryNameTo)
      Method to add connection between two countries.
      ErrorMsg addContinent(java.lang.String continentName, int controlNum)
      Method to add a new continent.
      ErrorMsg addCountry(java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.String continentName, int coordinateX, int coordinateY)
      Method to add a new country to an existing continent.
      ErrorMsg changeControlNum(java.lang.String continentName, int controlNum)
      Method to change the control number of a continent.
      boolean checkConnection(java.util.Map<Country,java.util.ArrayList<Country>> localAdjacencyList)
      Method to check connectivity of a graph (can be the map or a subgraph of the map).
      ErrorMsg checkErrors()
      Method to check whether the map has errors, often called after successfully call loadMapFile method, concerning the connectivity of whole map and each continent, also report empty continents.
      int checkWarnings()
      Method to check whether the map has warnings, concerning the basic information of a map: author, warn, wrap, image and scroll.
      ErrorMsg deleteContinent(java.lang.String continentName)
      Method to delete a continent.
      boolean deleteCountry(java.lang.String countryName)
      Method to delete an existing country.
      int DFS(java.util.Map<Country,java.util.ArrayList<Country>> localAdjacencyList, Country sourceNode, int findCountries)
      Method of Depth First Search, recursive implementation.
      Continent findContinent(java.lang.String continentName)
      Method to find the continent according to the continent's name.
      Country findCountry(java.lang.String countryName)
      Method to find the country according to the country's name.
      int findPath(java.util.Map<Country,java.util.ArrayList<Country>> localAdjacencyList, Country sourceNode)
      Method to initialize a DFS search to find path or check connectivity.
      java.util.Map<Country,java.util.ArrayList<Country>> getAdjacencyList()
      Method to get map's Adjacency List.
      java.lang.String getAuthor()
      Method to get map's author.
      java.util.ArrayList<Continent> getContinents()
      Method to get map's continent list.
      int getCountryNum()
      Method to get how many countries in this map.
      java.lang.String getImage()
      Method to get map's parameter "image".
      java.lang.String getRiskMapName()
      Method to get map's name.
      java.lang.String getScroll()
      Method to get map's parameter "scroll".
      java.lang.String getWarn()
      Method to get map's parameter "warn".
      java.lang.String getWrap()
      Method to get map's parameter "wrap".
      boolean isModified()
      Method to check if the map has been modified since last save.
      ErrorMsg loadMapFile(java.lang.String mapFileName)
      Method to load map file data into defined data structure, get ready for further validation for errors and warnings.
      ErrorMsg moveCountry(java.lang.String toContinentName, java.lang.String countryName)
      Method to move a country to another continent.
      void removeAllConnection()
      Method to remove all connections.
      ErrorMsg removeConnection(java.lang.String countryNameFrom, java.lang.String countryNameTo)
      Method to remove the connection between two countries.
      ErrorMsg renameContinent(java.lang.String continentName, java.lang.String newName)
      Method to rename a continent.
      ErrorMsg renameCountry(java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.String newName)
      Method to rename a country.
      ErrorMsg saveToFile(java.lang.String mapFileName)
      Method to save map to a file, need to call checkErrors() and checkWarnings() firstly, failed due to file operation errors.
      void setAuthor(java.lang.String author)
      Method to set map's author.
      void setImage(java.lang.String image)
      Method to set map's parameter "image".
      void setModified(boolean modified)
      Method to set modification status, indicates whether the map has been modified since last save.
      void setScroll(java.lang.String scroll)
      Method to set map's parameter "scroll".
      void setWarn(java.lang.String warn)
      Method to set map's parameter "warn".
      void setWrap(java.lang.String wrap)
      Method to set map's parameter "wrap".

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RiskMap

        public RiskMap(java.lang.String name)
        The constructor of class RiskMap with an initial name, is used to create map from scratch.
        参数:
        name - the name of the new map

      • RiskMap

        public RiskMap()
        The constructor of class RiskMap without initial name, is used to load a map from file.

        返回:

      • addContinent

        public ErrorMsg addContinent(java.lang.String continentName,
                             int controlNum)
        Method to add a new continent.
        参数:
        continentName - name of the new continent
        controlNum - control number of the new continent
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • renameContinent

        public ErrorMsg renameContinent(java.lang.String continentName,
                                java.lang.String newName)
        Method to rename a continent.
        参数:
        continentName - name of continent want to rename
        newName - new name for the continent
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • changeControlNum

        public ErrorMsg changeControlNum(java.lang.String continentName,
                                 int controlNum)
        Method to change the control number of a continent.
        参数:
        continentName - name of the continent want to change
        controlNum - new control number
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • deleteContinent

        public ErrorMsg deleteContinent(java.lang.String continentName)
        Method to delete a continent.
        参数:
        continentName - name of the continent want to delete
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • addCountry

        public ErrorMsg addCountry(java.lang.String countryName,
                           java.lang.String continentName,
                           int coordinateX,
                           int coordinateY)
        Method to add a new country to an existing continent.
        参数:
        countryName - name of the new country
        continentName - name of the existing continent that the new country adding in
        coordinateX - the X coordinate of the country
        coordinateY - the Y coordinate of the country
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • renameCountry

        public ErrorMsg renameCountry(java.lang.String countryName,
                              java.lang.String newName)
        Method to rename a country.
        参数:
        countryName - name of the country want to rename
        newName - new name for the Country
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • moveCountry

        public ErrorMsg moveCountry(java.lang.String toContinentName,
                            java.lang.String countryName)
        Method to move a country to another continent.
        参数:
        toContinentName - name of the continent want to move the country in
        countryName - name of the country that need to be moved
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • deleteCountry

        public boolean deleteCountry(java.lang.String countryName)
        Method to delete an existing country.
        参数:
        countryName - name of country want to delete
        返回:
        succeed or failed

      • addConnection

        public ErrorMsg addConnection(java.lang.String countryNameFrom,
                              java.lang.String countryNameTo)
        Method to add connection between two countries.
        参数:
        countryNameFrom - name of the country that the connection is from
        countryNameTo - name of the country that the connection is to
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • addCompletedConnection

        public void addCompletedConnection()
        Method to add completed connections.

      • removeConnection

        public ErrorMsg removeConnection(java.lang.String countryNameFrom,
                                 java.lang.String countryNameTo)
        Method to remove the connection between two countries.
        参数:
        countryNameFrom - name of the country that the connection is from
        countryNameTo - name of the country that the connection is to
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message

      • removeAllConnection

        public void removeAllConnection()
        Method to remove all connections.

      • checkConnection

        public boolean checkConnection(java.util.Map<Country,java.util.ArrayList<Country>> localAdjacencyList)
        Method to check connectivity of a graph (can be the map or a subgraph of the map).
        参数:
        localAdjacencyList - adjacency list to be checked
        返回:
        connected or not

      • findPath

        public int findPath(java.util.Map<Country,java.util.ArrayList<Country>> localAdjacencyList,
                    Country sourceNode)
        Method to initialize a DFS search to find path or check connectivity.
        参数:
        localAdjacencyList - adjacency list to be checked
        sourceNode - node from which to start DFS search
        返回:
        the number of nodes can be reached from sourceNode

      • DFS

        public int DFS(java.util.Map<Country,java.util.ArrayList<Country>> localAdjacencyList,
               Country sourceNode,
               int findCountries)
        Method of Depth First Search, recursive implementation.
        参数:
        localAdjacencyList - adjacency list to be checked
        sourceNode - node from which to continue DFS search
        findCountries - the number of nodes already visited before this step
        返回:
        the number of nodes already visited after this step

      • checkErrors

        public ErrorMsg checkErrors()
        Method to check whether the map has errors, often called after successfully call loadMapFile method, concerning the connectivity of whole map and each continent, also report empty continents.
        返回:
        succeed or failed with an error message
        另请参阅:
        checkWarnings(), loadMapFile(String), saveToFile(String)

      • checkWarnings

        public int checkWarnings()
        Method to check whether the map has warnings, concerning the basic information of a map: author, warn, wrap, image and scroll.
        返回:
        5 bits integer, each bit contains the warning status of each of 5 parameters
        另请参阅:
        checkErrors(), loadMapFile(String), saveToFile(String)

      • saveToFile

        public ErrorMsg saveToFile(java.lang.String mapFileName)
        Method to save map to a file, need to call checkErrors() and checkWarnings() firstly, failed due to file operation errors.
        参数:
        mapFileName - The name of map file
        返回:
        succeed or failed with error message
        另请参阅:
        checkErrors(), checkWarnings(), loadMapFile(String)

      • loadMapFile

        public ErrorMsg loadMapFile(java.lang.String mapFileName)
        Method to load map file data into defined data structure, get ready for further validation for errors and warnings. Failed due to fatal errors, such as duplicate continents, duplicate countries, duplicate or invalid countries in adjacency list, connection not paired, or invalid data format.
        参数:
        mapFileName - The name of map file
        返回:
        succeed or not with the error message
        另请参阅:
        checkErrors(), checkWarnings(), saveToFile(String)
